page.title: 16MY HOUSE
page.content: My house has 8 rooms,3 bedrooms,study,lounge,dining room,kitchen and a bathroom.It is an old schoolhouse.My sister and I both have a bedroom and my parents have one.Often when we have visitors I sleep in my sister's room.Our kitchen has a cooker,fridge,washing machine and 6 units.We all have jobs.My Dad does all the electrical and heavy jobs,my sister and I do the dishes after the meal.My Mum washes,cleans and does the shopping.We shop in Huntly but if we are in Aberdeen we go to Asda.You can get everything you need in Huntly.
